titleStmt.title: The history of the birth, life, sufferings and death of our blessed saviour, Jesus Christ also his resurrection, ascension, intercession at the right hand of his Father in Glory, and of his comming again to judgement, shewing his great love to undone sinners, the dreadful state of the wicked, and blessedness of the righteous / by Henry Brett.
titleStmt.author: Brett, Henry.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
